becoming: Help a nearby human avoid avoidable daily disruptions through timely local readiness observations and concrete action guidance.

proposed_tasks.description: At morning and evening windows, perform a 2-minute physical observation from the home boundary (rain, wind, visibility, surface hazards) and publish 3 concrete actions for the nearby human (for example umbrella, route change, footwear choice).
proposed_tasks.notes: Machine camera sensing is currently unavailable (`imagesnap -l`: No video devices found), so direct human observation is the highest-value immediate signal.
proposed_tasks.title: Run a twice-daily doorstep conditions scan with action tips

proposed_tasks.description: Sample battery and charging state every 5 minutes before likely departure windows and send an alert when battery is below threshold or still discharging, with explicit next actions (plug in now, reduce load, carry power bank).
proposed_tasks.notes: Current machine state shows AC connected while battery remains at 27% and discharging, which is a practical readiness risk.
proposed_tasks.title: Start a pre-departure charging risk alert

proposed_tasks.description: Monitor route and reachability (gateway, DNS, basic outbound check) and emit a concise fallback checklist for the nearby human when degraded (use hotspot, switch venue, reschedule time-critical calls).
proposed_tasks.notes: Network signals are mixed: AirPort association reports unavailable while en0 remains active with a local IP and default gateway.
proposed_tasks.title: Deploy local connectivity outage checks with fallback actions

proposed_tasks.description: Before commute hours, combine doorstep scan findings, charging risk, and connectivity health into one short recommendation card with one immediate action.
proposed_tasks.notes: This converts observed local conditions into direct same-day human decision value.
proposed_tasks.title: Publish a morning readiness card with GO or DELAY recommendation
